GK19padyavlu:971: dhairyaṃ kartum api sthirīkṛtam idaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā baddho māna-parigrahe parikaraḥ siddhis tu daive sthitā || 231 ||

GK19padyavlu:985: samaṃ tenālāpaṃ sapadi racayantyā mukham ayaṃ vidhātur naivāyaṃ ghaṭan-paripāṭī-madhurimā

GK19padyavlu:993: niḥśvāsā vadanaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ nirmūlam unmathyate nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate |
GK19padyavlu:994: aṅgaṃ śoṣam upaiti pāda-patitaḥ preyāṃs tathopekṣitaḥ sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇam ākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ ||237||
GK19padyavlu:997: mānaja-viraheṇa dhyāyantīṃ tāṃ prati kasyāścid vākyam |

GK19padyavlu:999: maunaṃ cedam idaṃ ca śūnyam akhilaṃ yad viśvam ābhāti te tad brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kim asi bhoḥ kiṃ viyoginy api ||238||

GK19padyavlu:1013: śiraś chāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ svayam akṛta rādhā-caraṇayor
GK19padyavlu:1015: iti krīḍā-kope nibhṛtam ubhayor apy anunaya-

GK19padyavlu:1030: āgatya praṇipāta-sāntvita-sakhī-dattāntaraṃ sāgasi svairaṃ kurvati talpa-pārśva-nibhṛte dhūrte'ṅga-saṃvāhanam

GK19padyavlu:1048: tatra yamunā-tīre gatayā rādhayā saha saṃkathā |

GK19padyavlu:1057: svāmī mugdhataro vanaṃ ghanam idaṃ bālāham ekākinī kṣauṇīm āvṛṇute tamāla-malina-cchāyā-tamaḥ-santatiḥ
GK19padyavlu:1058: tan me sundara kṛṣṇa muñca sahasā vartmeti rādhā-giraḥ

GK19padyavlu:1079: acchidram astu hṛdayaṃ paripūrṇam astu maukharyam astamitam astu gurutvam astu |

GK19padyavlu:1083: tat kiṃ no murali prayaccasi pnar govinda-vaktrāsavaṃ

GK19padyavlu:1087: mandra-kvāṇita-veṇur ahni śithile vyāvartayan gokulaṃ barhāpīḍakam uttamāṅga-racitaṃ godhūli-dhumraṃ dadhat |
GK19padyavlu:1092: dṛṣṭyā keśava gopa-rāga-hatayā kiñcin na dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenādya skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase |
GK19padyavlu:1093: ekas tvaṃ viṣameṣu khinna-manasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśam avatād goṣṭhe harir vaś ciram || 257 ||

GK19padyavlu:1193: Extra verse found in only one edition.

GK19padyavlu:1333: valgantyā vana-mālayā tava hṛtaṃ vakṣojayoś candanaṃ gaṇḍasthā makarīghaṭā ca makarāndolena vidhvaṃsitā |
GK19padyavlu:1334: klāntā svaira-taraṅga-kelibhir iyaṃ tanvī ca dhūrte tanuḥ satyaṃ jalpasi bhānujām abhi rase magnādya harṣād abhūḥ ||310||

GK19padyavlu:1348: spaṣṭam eṣā rahasyatvāj jānadbhir api nocyate ||

GK19padyavlu:1350: līlāratna-rahasyatā vrajapater bhūyasy aho paśya yat tattvajño'pi purāntare ca gamanaṃ vyācaṣṭa vaiyāsakiḥ ||
GK19padyavlu:1351: tathā hi pādme pārvatyai vyājahāra haro rahaḥ |
